summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 9.7°C) and outside temperature (down 9.5°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 10%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 310 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 22 miles) and cloud levels (up 198 m) when compared to today.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 425m and a high of 1526m, averaging 643.3m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; cold weather is expected. Also, dry air conditions likely prevail and gentle light winds are expected. Chance of light rain, cloud cover will be low, possibly causing overcast or foggy conditions, and it’s dark. Little change in the weather.
